document_data.name: Tarmas' home
document_data.mainbody: '''Tarmas' home''' was one of the houses in the village of [[West Harbor]] on the [[Sword Coast North]]. It belonged to [[Tarmas]].
document_data.Location: Located in the center of the village, Tarmas' home was located between the [[Starling house]] and [[Pierson's home]].
document_data.Structure: Like the other houses in West Harbor, Tarmas' home was wooden.
document_data.Interior: The building was small. It was composed of a bedroom, a laboratory and a library.
document_data.History: Tarmas and the [[Kalach-Cha]]'s friend, [[Amie Fern]], lived in this house. When [[duergar]] and [[bladeling]]s attacked the village in [[1374 DR]], Tarmas ordered the Kalach-Cha to retrieve some supplies from his house, which would aid them in the battle. The supplies were books, scrolls, potions and a magical [[mandolin]].
